sentences.en: a bee sting
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂蜇伤

sentences.en: Antiseptic stings a little.
sentences.cn: 消毒剂稍有刺痛感。

sentences.en: Does a bee die when it loses its sting?
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂失去蛰针会死 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was stung by a bee.
sentences.cn: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

sentences.en: His words carry a sting.
sentences.cn: 他的话中有刺.

sentences.en: How much did they sting you for that pair of boots?
sentences.cn: 这双靴子他们敲了你多少钱?

sentences.en: How much did they sting you for?
sentences.cn: 他们敲了你多少钱?

sentences.en: Never put any essential oils near the eyes. They are very strong and could sting.
sentences.cn: 千万不要将任何精油抹到眼睛周围。它们有很强的刺激性，可能会使眼睛产生刺痛感。

sentences.en: Peppers sting the tongue.
sentences.cn: 胡椒蜇舌头.

sentences.en: Remove the bee sting with tweezers.
sentences.cn: 用镊子拔掉蜜蜂的螫刺。

sentences.en: Rub ointment onto the wasp sting.
sentences.cn: 在黄蜂刺伤处涂些药膏.

sentences.en: She felt the sting of tears in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.en: Sprays can sting sensitive skin.
sentences.cn: 这些喷剂会使敏感肌肤感到刺痛。

sentences.en: the Budget comes with a sting in the tail—future tax increases.
sentences.cn: 预算带来一个令人意外的结果——今后税收要提高。

sentences.en: The scorpion has a sting that can be deadly.
sentences.cn: 蝎子有可以致命的螫针.

sentences.en: There's always a sting in his words.
sentences.cn: 他说话总带刺儿.

sentences.en: This won't hurt — you will just feel a little sting.
sentences.cn: 这不痛——你只会感觉到像被轻轻叮了一下。

sentences.en: When you slice an onion, it makes your eyes sting.
sentences.cn: 切葱头辣眼睛.

sentences.en: You can get a nasty sting from a jellyfish.
sentences.cn: 你可能会被水母狠狠地蜇一下.

sentences.en: Your visit will take away the sting of her sorrow.
sentences.cn: 您的来访会消除她的悲伤.

words.tran_cn: 激烈的；刺人的；刺一样的
吝啬的，小气的；有刺的；缺乏的
讽刺者；好讽刺人的人；有刺的动物；鸡尾酒

trans.tran_cn: 螫伤处，（某些昆虫的）毒刺，（身体或心灵的）剧痛，（警察为抓捕罪犯而设的）圈套
trans.tran_en: a wound or mark made when an insect or plant stings you
if an insect or a plant stings you, it makes a very small hole in your skin and you feel a sharp pain because of a poisonous substance
if an insect or a plant stings you, it makes a very small hole in your skin and you feel a sharp pain because of a poisonous substance
if an insect or a plant stings you, it makes a very small hole in your skin and you feel a sharp pain because of a poisonous substance

trans.tran_cn: 叮，螫，刺痛，精神上刺痛，刺激
